alert.note: Alert for Coalinga - Avenal; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued March 11 at 2:40AM PST until March 11 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. Local visibility down to around 50 feet. * WHERE...Coalinga, Avenal, Lemoore, and West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...CHP reported visibility around 50 to 100 feet in Coalinga. Highways impacted include, but are not limited to, Interstate 5, as well as SR 33, 41, 145, 198, and 269.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Coalinga - Avenal; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties
